alert.note: Alert for Newton; Pope; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued February 16 at 1:56AM CST until February 16 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN SEARCY...SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON AND NORTH CENTRAL POPE COUNTIES... At 156 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Moore, or 19 miles southeast of Jasper, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Moore... Marsena... Bohannon... Witts Spring... Ben Hur... Snowball... Tilly... TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
